t: Amazon confirms first MT facility being built in Missoula; will create 100 jobs
s: December 7, 2022 - Brand Ave. Studios ... A massive $8 million Amazon delivery center is under construction near the Wye just west of Missoula, as pictured here in October of 2022.

t: Governor Gianforte Cuts Ribbon on First Amazon Facility in Montana
s: MISSOULA, Mont. – Today in Missoula, Governor Greg Gianforte cut the ribbon on the first Amazon facility in Montana. Representing Amazon’s first major investment in the state, the new delivery station created more than 100 jobs.

t: Amazon cuts the ribbon on Missoula facility, first in Montana
s: April 2, 2024 - E-commerce giant Amazon touted its first Montana logistics facility, holding a ceremonial ribbon-cutting at the Missoula-area operation with Gov. Greg Gianforte and Missoula County Commissioner Dave Strohmaier.

t: Amazon distribution center set to open in Kalispell | Missoula News | montanarightnow.com
s: A new Amazon distribution center is coming to Kalispell, confirmed by the city. The facility is under construction on the south side of town, near Highway 93 and United Drive.

t: Huge New Missoula Warehouse Will be For Amazon Delivery
s: Montana Governor Greg Gianforte broke the news for Missoulians on Friday as he welcomed Amazon to Montana with a huge new warehouse.

t: Amazon building facility in Missoula, first-ever in Montana | Montana News | montanarightnow.com
s: HELENA, Mont. - Amazon is currently building a facility in Missoula, the first Amazon facility in Montana.

t: Governor’s Office confirms Amazon fulfillment center in Missoula
s: A large structure under construction near near the airport in Missoula has drawn a bit of public attention in recent months, and Governor's Office on Friday confirmed it will be Amazon's newest delivery station.

t: Amazon warehouse began as speculative project; warehousing demand high in Missoula
s: December 23, 2022 - The new delivery station will receive orders from larger Amazon facilities across the country and dispatch delivery vans to bring those orders to Montana customers.
